nodes.text: Van Ling is the artist who created the menus for the Star Wars film DVDs and Star Wars: Clone Wars DVDs. He also gathered behind-the-scenes imagery to produce the DVD included with the Limited Edition of Sculpting a Galaxy: Inside the Star Wars Model Shop. Ling also created screen graphics and other material for the preshow queue of "Star Tours: The Adventures Continue" for the Disneyland theme parks around the world.
